wiki.summary: “Faucet Failure” is an upbeat track from Ski Mask the Slump God, featuring him flexing his “drip,” or expensive clothing, comparing it to the way a faucet drips when it breaks. The track’s instrumental is centered around a steel drum and horn line with booming bass in the background. Ski first previewed the song in a video on October 20, 2018. “Faucet Failure” debuted at #100 on the Billboard Hot 100 for the week of March 9th, 2019 and peaked at #87 during the week of March 16th, 2019. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: “Faucet Failure” is an upbeat track from Ski Mask the Slump God, featuring him flexing his “drip,” or expensive clothing, comparing it to the way a faucet drips when it breaks. The track’s instrumental is centered around a steel drum and horn line with booming bass in the background. Ski first previewed the song in a video on October 20, 2018. “Faucet Failure” debuted at #100 on the Billboard Hot 100 for the week of March 9th, 2019 and peaked at #87 during the week of March 16th, 2019. “Faucet Failure” was certified platinum by the RIAA on April 16, 2020. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
